00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __SPI_SD_H
00030 #define __SPI_SD_H
00031 
00032 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00033 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00034 
00035 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00036   * @{
00037   */
00038

00048 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 #define SD_SPI_PORT                       (SD_SPI)
00050 #define SD_SPI_DIV                        (SystemCoreClock/400000)    /* Fixed 400 kHz                      */
00051 #define SD_SPI_DIV_HIGHSPEED              (2)                         /* Maximum Speed. SystemCoreClock/2   */
00052 #define SD_BLOCK_SIZE                     (512)
00053 
00054 #define SD_CS_PORT                        (SD_SPI_SEL_PORT)
00055 #define SD_CS_PIN                         (SD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_PIN)
00056 
00057 //#define SD_CD_PORT                        (HT_GPIOA)
00058 //#define SD_CD_PIN                         (GPIO_PIN_1)
00059 
00060 #define SD_DEBUG                          (0)
00061 
00062 #define SDHC_SUPPORT                      (1)
00063 
00064 #define SD_INIT_CNT                       (100)     /* For SD_Init                                          */
00065 #define SD_IDLE_CNT                       (100)     /* For SD_SetIdleStateSPI                               */
00066 #define SD_GETRSP_CNT                     (0xFFFF)  /* For SD_GetResponse                                   */
00067 #define SD_GETDRSP_CNT                    (500)     /* SD_GetDataResponse                                   */
00068 #define SD_CHECK_VER                      (0xFFFF)
00069 
00070 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 typedef struct
00072 {
00073   u8  CSDStruct;            /* CSD structure                                                                */
00074   u8  SysSpecVersion;       /* System specification version                                                 */
00075   u8  Reserved1;            /* Reserved                                                                     */
00076   u8  TAAC;                 /* Data read access-time 1                                                      */
00077   u8  NSAC;                 /* Data read access-time 2 in CLK cycles                                        */
00078   u8  MaxBusClkFrec;        /* Max. bus clock frequency                                                     */
00079   u16 CardComdClasses;      /* Card command classes                                                         */
00080   u8  RdBlockLen;           /* Max. read data block length                                                  */
00081   u8  PartBlockRead;        /* Partial blocks for read allowed                                              */
00082   u8  WrBlockMisalign;      /* Write block misalignment                                                     */
00083   u8  RdBlockMisalign;      /* Read block misalignment                                                      */
00084   u8  DSRImpl;              /* DSR implemented                                                              */
00085   u8  Reserved2;            /* Reserved                                                                     */
00086   u16 DeviceSize;           /* Device Size                                                                  */
00087   u8  MaxRdCurrentVDDMin;   /* Max. read current @ VDD min                                                  */
00088   u8  MaxRdCurrentVDDMax;   /* Max. read current @ VDD max                                                  */
00089   u8  MaxWrCurrentVDDMin;   /* Max. write current @ VDD min                                                 */
00090   u8  MaxWrCurrentVDDMax;   /* Max. write current @ VDD max                                                 */
00091   u8  DeviceSizeMul;        /* Device size multiplier                                                       */
00092   u8  EraseGrSize;          /* Erase group size                                                             */
00093   u8  EraseGrMul;           /* Erase group size multiplier                                                  */
00094   u8  WrProtectGrSize;      /* Write protect group size                                                     */
00095   u8  WrProtectGrEnable;    /* Write protect group enable                                                   */
00096   u8  ManDeflECC;           /* Manufacturer default ECC                                                     */
00097   u8  WrSpeedFact;          /* Write speed factor                                                           */
00098   u8  MaxWrBlockLen;        /* Max. write data block length                                                 */
00099   u8  WriteBlockPaPartial;  /* Partial blocks for write allowed                                             */
00100   u8  Reserved3;            /* Reserved                                                                     */
00101   u8  ContentProtectAppli;  /* Content protection application                                               */
00102   u8  FileFormatGrouop;     /* File format group                                                            */
00103   u8  CopyFlag;             /* Copy flag (OTP)                                                              */
00104   u8  PermWrProtect;        /* Permanent write protection                                                   */
00105   u8  TempWrProtect;        /* Temporary write protection                                                   */
00106   u8  FileFormat;           /* File Format                                                                  */
00107   u8  ECC;                  /* ECC code                                                                     */
00108   u8  msd_CRC;              /* CRC                                                                          */
00109   u8  Reserved4;            /* always 1                                                                     */
00110 } SD_CSD_TypeDef;
00111 
00112 typedef struct
00113 {
00114   u8  ManufacturerID;      /* ManufacturerID                                                                */
00115   u16 OEM_AppliID;         /* OEM/Application ID                                                            */
00116   u32 ProdName1;           /* Product Name part1                                                            */
00117   u8  ProdName2;           /* Product Name part2                                                            */
00118   u8  ProdRev;             /* Product Revision                                                              */
00119   u32 ProdSN;              /* Product Serial Number                                                         */
00120   u8  Reserved1;           /* Reserved1                                                                     */
00121   u16 ManufactDate;        /* Manufacturing Date                                                            */
00122   u8  msd_CRC;             /* CRC                                                                           */
00123   u8  Reserved2;           /* always 1                                                                      */
00124 } SD_CID_TypeDef;
00125 
00126 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00127 #define SD_RESPONSE_NOERR                 (0x00)
00128 #define SD_IN_IDLE_STATE                  (0x01)
00129 #define SD_ERASE_RESET                    (0x02)
00130 #define SD_ILLEGAL_COMMAND                (0x04)
00131 #define SD_COM_CRC_ERR                    (0x08)
00132 #define SD_ERASE_SEQUENCE_ERR             (0x10)
00133 #define SD_ADDRESS_ERR                    (0x20)
00134 #define SD_PARAMETER_ERR                  (0x40)
00135 #define SD_RESPONSE_ERR                   (0xFF)
00136 
00137 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 #define SD_CS_ACTIVE()                    (SD_CS_PORT->RR = SD_CS_PIN)
00139 #define SD_CS_INACTIVE()                  (SD_CS_PORT->SRR = SD_CS_PIN)
00140 #define SD_CD_READ()                      (0)
00141 
00142 /* Exported variables --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00143 extern u32 uSD_IsSDHC;
00144 
00145 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146 u32 SD_Init(void);
00147 u32 SD_ReadBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uReadAddr, u32 uReadSize);
00148 u32 SD_ReadMultipleBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uReadAddr, u32 uWriteSize);
00149 u32 SD_WriteBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uWritedAddr, u32 uWriteSize);
00150 u32 SD_WriteMultipleBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uWritedAddr, u32 uWriteSize);
00151 u32 SD_GetCSDRegister(SD_CSD_TypeDef* SD_CSD);
00152 u32 SD_GetCIDRegister(SD_CID_TypeDef* SD_CID);
00153 u32 SD_IsWriteBusy(void);
00154 u32 SD_IsReadBusy(void);
00155 u32 SD_IsCardDetected(void);
